metadata.title: CVE-2022-49043 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
xmlXIncludeAddNode in xinclude.c in libxml2 before 2.11.0 has ause-after-free.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-49043` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.12.7+dfsg-3ubuntu0.1
libxml2-utils - 2.12.7+dfsg-3ubuntu0.1
python3-libxml2 - 2.12.7+dfsg-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.12.7+dfsg-3ubuntu0.1').
